name: Yeli Orog
description: Yeli Orog is a short atmospheric FMV game about an immense archaeological discovery: A bizarre stone tablet written in the Celtiberian language found buried underneath an ancient dolmen in northern Spain.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit, Windows 10 64-bit Processor: Intel Core i5 3320M 2.60 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 Storage: 4 GB available space Additional Notes: 21:9 screens are not supported. 3D sound is used throughout the game, play with headphones if possible.
